import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://suay-resort-api.onrender.com/'});// can set a base url here
export var fetchRooms=function fetchRooms(){return API.get('/rooms');};export var fetchRoom=function fetchRoom(url){return API.post("/rooms/".concat(url));};export var fetchAvailableRooms=function fetchAvailableRooms(data){return API.post('/bookings/available',data);};export var fetchAllBookings=function fetchAllBookings(){return API.get('/bookings');};export var fetchExistingBooking=function fetchExistingBooking(data){return API.post('/bookings',data);};export var createBooking=function createBooking(data){return API.post('/bookings/create',data);};export var deleteBooking=function deleteBooking(data){return API.post('/bookings/delete',data);};export var signin=function signin(data){return API.post('/auth',data);};
